title: How to Bake Pastizzis

steps.headline: Prepare your dough.
steps.description: Mix flour and water until the dough is nice and stiff and roll into coils to provide a nice layered crust.

steps.headline: Freeze the dough in the freezer for three to four hours to maintain a layered coiled shape.
Prepare your stuffing.
steps.description: Mix 7 fluid ounces (210 mL) of ricotta and 7 fluid ounces (210 mL) of mozzarella (any shredded cheese you prefer). with four unbeaten eggs.

steps.headline: Thaw out your dough and slice it into tart sized coils.
steps.description: These are not to exceed .125 inches (3.2 mm). Spread the margarine on the dough with a brush.

steps.headline: Place cheese stuffing on your dough.
steps.description: Cover the cheese with another tart sized dough piece. Press the edges of the dough with a fork to provide a nice seal around the cheese.

steps.headline: Preheat your oven at 425 °F (218 °C) and set the oven to bake.

text: Prepare your dough. Mix flour and water until the dough is nice and stiff and roll into coils to provide a nice layered crust. Freeze the dough in the freezer for three to four hours to maintain a layered coiled shape.  Prepare your stuffing. Mix 7 fluid ounces (210 mL) of ricotta and 7 fluid ounces (210 mL) of mozzarella (any shredded cheese you prefer). with four unbeaten eggs. Thaw out your dough and slice it into tart sized coils. These are not to exceed .125 inches (3.2 mm). Spread the margarine on the dough with a brush. Place cheese stuffing on your dough. Cover the cheese with another tart sized dough piece. Press the edges of the dough with a fork to provide a nice seal around the cheese. Preheat your oven at 425 °F (218 °C) and set the oven to bake. Bake the pastizzis for 25 minutes. Enjoy the pastry.
